com.vernalis.pdbconnector.config
Class StandardCategory

java.lang.Object
  com.vernalis.pdbconnector.config.StandardCategory

public class StandardCategory
extends java.lang.Object

StandardCategory class. A StandardCategory represents a sub-heading in the "Select Report" dropdown of the Report Options dialog tab, and contains a collection of related StandardReport objects.

See Also:
StandardReport
